title: crash game
body: today i played a match and  my game was crashed and i saw a nofitication about client. i want to know it is that error

replies.body: i don't remember anh i forgot save that error. but when i come back the match, the match run as window, and i can't swith to another window, and camera only move up, turn left and turn right, but it can't move down, so i must lock camera to play match

It might also be like my game that just crashed.  I got through the que and when the client tried to send me to the loading screen the loading screen crashed.  I was trying to play as Star Guardian Poppy if that helps.
I'm confused about the issue that you're having.  When you say crash, what happened exactly and when?  What did you see?  Where there error messages?  Let me know!
